name: Havocado
description:
Havocado is a silly hyper-speed multiplayer physics fighting game; shoot, punch, drive, and use magic to knock the other players off in a multitude of locations and scenarios.

Havocado features:

  • Physics-based ragdoll combat
  • 50+ levels
  • 30+ weapons
  • 10+ Drivable (and flyable) vehicles
  • 4 factions with special items/weapons
  • Rare items and special events means a wild new experience every game
  • Various game modes (tournament mode, streaming mode, couch mode)
